title: Roasted pears with cranberry chilli jam

For the roasted pears: 1-2 pears, cored and sliced into wedges
For the cranberry chilli jam: 2 satsumas, juice of one, the other peeled and segmented

steps: For the roasted pears, heat the butter in an ovenproof frying pan. Add the pear wedges and caster sugar and fry for a few minutes until lightly golden.
Place into the oven and roast for 6-8 minutes, or until tender and caramelised.
For the cranberry chilli jam, place all the ingredients into a pan and simmer for five minutes.
To serve, arrange the pears on a plate and spoon over the cranberry chilli jam.
